column6: L.A. NIGHTS BURN BRIGHT WITH THE FLAMES OF VENGEANCE! - Having tamed satanic serial killer ELI MORROW'S Spirit, ROBBIE REYES boldly enforces justice on the streets of LA...but can't seem to keep things in order at home. - Little brother GABE'S medical condition is improving by leaps and bounds but something's causing his relationship with Robbie to deteriorate just as quickly. - As ALL-NEW GHOST RIDER'S powers continue to evolve, Robbie finds out a shocking truth about his long lost parents.
